description.summary: A quick and healthy stir fry loaded with tender chicken and fresh vegetables in a savory soy ginger sauce. Perfect weeknight dinner served over rice.

ingredients.ingredient: chicken breast, sliced into thin strips

preparation.step: In a small bowl, mix soy sauce, sesame oil, chicken broth, rice vinegar, and cornstarch to create sauce.
Heat 1 tablespoon of vegetable oil in a large wok or skillet over high heat.
Add chicken strips and cook until golden and cooked through, about 5-7 minutes. Remove from wok and set aside.
Add remaining tablespoon of oil to the wok. Add broccoli, bell pepper, and onion. Stir fry for 5 minutes until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Add minced garlic and ginger, cook for 30 seconds until fragrant.
Return chicken to the wok and pour in the sauce. Toss everything together and cook for 2-3 minutes until sauce thickens.
Serve immediately over steamed white or brown rice.
